revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Flower Paradise |image = [[File:Flower Paradise.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Flower Paradise |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 224, the far top right. }} '''Flower Paradise''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 2,203,000 |- | Meganium || 7,000,000 |- | Venusaur || 7,900,000 |- | Shaymins || 9,000,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Vileplume * Bellsprout * Exeggutor * Bellossom * Skiploom * Sunflora * Roselia * Venusaur (boss) * Meganium (boss) * Shaymin (land) (boss) * Shaymin (sky) (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Incense]] || 50% |}
